task.title: Retrieve in Commands Tab
task.shortdesc: Return Discarded nodes to the Shelf using the Commands Tab.

context.p:
To Retrieve all Discarded nodes at once use the following steps:
Click on the Discarded drawer in the Sets bin.
Click Retrieve
To Retrieve a specific Class of nodes from the Discard bin use the following steps:

step.cmd: Click on the desired Class type in the Classes bin.
step.info: Note that clicking on a Class type automatically Selects those nodes for future actions, as indicated by their bold appearance.

taskbody.result: In this example, the function Retrieve was executed on the Class Type "Person." As a result, the Person node in the Discard Bin, labelled "Jules Verne," was returned to the Shelf. However, the Person nodes in the central Graph remained untouched.
